data.lyric:
[ti:SoulFly]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]SoulFly - Rod Wave
[00:00.15]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Thomas Horton/Tahj Vaughn/Rashaad Green/Ryan Hartlove
[00:00.31]Pipe that s**t up TnT
[00:00.99]So did you get it
[00:01.90]Yeah I got it
[00:03.11]Okay I'm just checking
[00:03.96]Tahj Money
[00:05.36]You alright
[00:06.72]I don't feel good
[00:08.49]Alright call me when you get home
[00:10.53]Shaad Krounds
[00:11.04]Conversatin' with mama she say I'm in too deep
[00:13.88]Until my n***as rich and free it's hard to get me some sleep
[00:16.42]It's hard to get me some peace with all the s**t that I be battlin'
[00:19.85]So many ups and downs sometimes I feel like I can't balance it
[00:23.14]It be challenging so many challenges
[00:27.60]Yeah
[00:28.71]Oh father it's safe to say times harder
[00:33.10]This s**t get harder
[00:34.44]My pops say "Son be smarter you a artist and a father"
[00:37.10]My unc' say "Now be smarter you a target and regardless
[00:39.93]You a leader to them people and them young n***as is watchin'
[00:42.91]Them young n***as believe in you don't let 'em down be cautious"
[00:46.90]And I got skills in other things but rich off rappin' pain
[00:49.73]So much that came with all this fame but I remain the same
[00:52.66]Hope you don't think 'cause I got change that's what made me change
[00:55.53]It's just this life got so strange I had to switch lanes
[00:58.57]N***as pulled up and I'll be outside
[01:00.84]Laid in the cut like peroxide yeah
[01:04.51]I vowed to be frontline when shots fired
[01:06.54]I was out of town that night when **** died yeah
[01:10.31]Standin' in church blurry-eyed that I had to confess
[01:12.81]Yeah
[01:13.28]I seen my n***a laid to rest in his Sunday best
[01:16.27]Polo on his head and chest now that's casket fresh
[01:19.08]Wish we would've seen eye to eye before you left
[01:21.81]And where I'm from it's an eye for an eye nothing else
[01:24.89]Ain't no love it ain't no help every man for they self
[01:27.53]Better watch your homies keep your strap or get strapped to a shelf
[01:30.29]Grrah
[01:30.78]Ain't no complaining when it's raining play the hand you dealt
[01:33.42]Ain't got no opps just some n***as who mad that I made it
[01:36.18]Yeah
[01:36.60]And since you n***as mad I made it pick a casket baby
[01:39.30]Grrah
[01:39.65]On the net exaggeratin' ain't even half as gangster
[01:42.13]It's funny and it's fascinatin' how even family hatin'
[01:44.98]Wanna hit the show but you ain't show up to my graduation
[01:47.39]Yeah yeah
[01:48.44]I can't take y'all to the top I ain't no elevator
[01:50.85]Think of my cousin Deyjah
[01:52.99]Was way in 2013 when she left I was 15 when she left
[01:55.99]They say it won't be long all I want
[02:02.73]Is when the horn blows and when they all cry
[02:07.33]I pray my soul flies pray my soul flies
[02:13.48]Pray my soul flies
[02:18.12]Turn into the f**kin' birds
[02:19.49]They say it won't be long all I want
[02:26.07]Is when the horn blows and when they all cry
[02:30.63]I pray my soul flies pray my soul flies
[02:35.04]Yeah yeah yeah yeah
[02:37.74]I pray my soul flies yeah yeah yeah yeah
[02:44.01]Ladies and gentlemen please prepare the cabin for takeoff
[02:46.00]Make sure your seatbacks are secured in the upright and locked position
[02:48.65]Pray my soul flies
[02:49.22]Your tray tables put away and all carry on items are securely stowed
[02:51.55]I pray my soul flies
[02:52.47]We will be moving through the cabin for a final safety check
[02:54.51]And ask that you please review the safety regulation card
[02:56.80]Located in the seat pocket in front of you
[02:58.85]Now sit back relax and enjoy the flight
data.trans:
[ti:SoulFly]
[ar:Rod Wave]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.15]//
[00:00.31]TnTXD制作
[00:00.99]所以 你明白了吗
[00:01.90]我懂了
[00:03.11]好的 我只是确认一下
[00:03.96]Tahj Money制作
[00:05.36]你还好吗
[00:06.72]我感觉不太好
[00:08.49]好吧 等你回到家 给我打个电话
[00:10.53]Shaad K’Rounds制作
[00:11.04]与妈妈促膝长谈 她说我陷得太深
[00:13.88]直到我的兄弟腰缠万贯 自由自在为止 我都难以安睡
[00:16.42]当我奋力抗争时 我难以平静下来
[00:19.85]经历过许多人生起伏 有时我感觉无法找到平衡
[00:23.14]极富挑战性 不计其数的挑战
[00:27.60]//
[00:28.71]父亲啊 毫不夸张的说 困难重重
[00:33.10]一切都愈发艰难
[00:34.44]我的爸爸说 孩子 放聪明点 你是一位艺术家 也是一位父亲
[00:37.10]我的叔叔说 现在 放聪明点 你是目标 不管怎样
[00:39.93]你是人们的领袖 这些年轻人拭目以待
[00:42.91]这些年轻人信任你 别让他们失望 谨慎行事
[00:46.90]我学习到其他的技能 但是用说唱表达痛苦让我发家致富
[00:49.73]名声为我带了很多东西 但是我一如往昔
[00:52.66]希望你不会认为我因为赚到钱就改变自己
[00:55.53]只是如今的生活变得很奇怪 我不得不转换车道
[00:58.57]哥们停下车子 我会待在外面
[01:00.84]不会退缩 等着敌人放马过来
[01:04.51]我发誓枪声响起时 我会冲锋陷阵
[01:06.54]朋友去世的那晚 我不在城里
[01:10.31]站在教堂里 泪眼婆娑 我不得不忏悔
[01:12.81]//
[01:13.28]我看着我的兄弟穿着精致的礼服下葬
[01:16.27]换上一身行头 才刚刚放进棺材里
[01:19.08]真希望在你离开之前 我们能够一拍即合
[01:21.81]在我的家乡 除了以眼还眼以牙还牙之外别无他法
[01:24.89]没有一丝爱 无济于事 人人都只为自己考虑
[01:27.53]最好当心你的哥们 随身带着枪 否则就在劫难逃
[01:30.29]//
[01:30.78]不会抱怨 即使大雨倾盆 也要勇敢面对现实
[01:33.42]没有敌人 只是一些嫉妒我功成名就的家伙
[01:36.18]//
[01:36.60]既然你嫉妒我功成名就 给自己挑一口棺材 宝贝
[01:39.30]//
[01:39.65]在网上口出狂言 其实没有暴徒一半厉害
[01:42.13]真是有趣 吸引人的地方在于家人互相憎恨
[01:44.98]想要观看演出 但是你不会出席我的毕业典礼
[01:47.39]//
[01:48.44]我无法带着你们走上巅峰 我又不是电梯
[01:50.85]想念我的表妹Deyjah
[01:52.99]她在2013年离开人世 当时我才15岁
[01:55.99]他们说这不会太久 我想要的
[02:02.73]就是当号角吹响时 当他们失声痛哭时
[02:07.33]我祈祷我灵魂自由翱翔 祈祷我灵魂自由翱翔
[02:13.48]祈祷我灵魂自由翱翔
[02:18.12]变成无拘无束的鸟儿
[02:19.49]他们说这不会太久 我想要的
[02:26.07]就是当号角吹响时 当他们失声痛哭时
[02:30.63]我祈祷我灵魂自由翱翔 祈祷我灵魂自由翱翔
[02:35.04]//
[02:37.74]我祈祷我灵魂自由翱翔
[02:44.01]女士们 先生们 请准备客舱起飞检查
[02:46.00]请确保你的座椅靠背处于直立状态和锁定位置
[02:48.65]祈祷我灵魂自由翱翔
[02:49.22]收起你的小桌板 所有随身携带物品请妥善保管
[02:51.55]我祈祷我灵魂自由翱翔
[02:52.47]客舱乘务员会进行最后一次安全检查
[02:54.51]请您再次查看
[02:56.80]放置在您座位前方口袋里的安全守则卡
[02:58.85]现在请坐好 放松 祝您旅途愉快
